attributes.action: Replace Bob Ainsworth as Defense Minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned have no confidence in Bob Ainsworth as Minister of Defense and call upon the Prime Minister to dismiss him and appoint a Minister of the talent and stature as befits  this great Office of State.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
